name: Small Village (Bardon)
description:
You are living in a small village. Today come Mario, Link and Lakita and they search the present of Princess Peachy. She wrote a false adress and it is somewhere in the village. But when you find the present you can't take it and give it to Mario, the people of the village insinst, that this present is their gift!

You must solve this adventure somehow, talk with the people there and explore the small village!
